org.apache.flex.compiler.units

Interface IInvisibleCompilationUnit

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICompilationUnit
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InvisibleCompilationUnit

    public interface IInvisibleCompilationUnit
extends ICompilationUnit
    A public interface clients may use to compile a transient version of a file. None of the operations on an IInvisibleCompilationUnit will change the state of an IASProject in a way that is visible to other ICompilationUnit's in the IASProject.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.flex.compiler.units.ICompilationUnit

        ICompilationUnit.Operation, ICompilationUnit.UnitType

    • Method Detail

      • getCompilerProblems

        void getCompilerProblems(Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
                         throws InterruptedException
        Finds all the ICompilerProblem's in this IInvisibleCompilationUnit.
        Parameters:
        problems - Collection the ICompilerProblem's should be added to.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • clean

        void clean()
        Invalidates the processing results of this IInvisibleCompilationUnit. Should be called by clients when ever any of the inputs of this IInvisibleCompilationUnit change. Changes to the IASProject's settings do *not* automatically invalidate the processing results of this IInvisibleCompilationUnit. Clients should manually call this methods after changing a IASProject settings ( we should fix this in the future... ).

      • remove

        void remove()
        Explicitly removes this IInvisibleCompilationUnit from an IASProject. This method will ensure that various cache entries in the IASProject and IWorkspace are purged.

        Clients don't need to call this, but calling it allows certain resource cleanups to happen earlier than would normally.
